blocks.text: Real Madrid Cruise Past Real Sociedad in Saturday's Action
A quiet Saturday in sports saw limited action across the dashboard. La Liga provided the main storyline while Viktor Hovland struggled at Pebble Beach.

blocks.label: La Liga
items: ⚽ Real Madrid dominated Real Sociedad 4-1 in convincing fashion
⚽ Sevilla and Alavés shared points in 1-1 draw
⚽ Espanyol and Celta Vigo played out 2-2 thriller

blocks.text: ⛳ Viktor Hovland languishes at T56 (-6) as Akshay Bhatia leads AT&T Pebble Beach at -19
